bs-translationtransfer-desc: Enables the translation and transfer of pages among wiki instances
log-description-bs-translation-transfer: This log contains information about titles translations
bs-translation-transfer-ui-language-sele: Select the language to translate the page to
bs-translation-transfer-ui-transfer-succ: The page $1 has been translated to [$2 $3]
bs-translation-transfer-local-no-languag: No valid languages for translation found
bs-translation-transfer-outdated-transla: This translation is outdated. Please check '''[$1 source language]'''
bs-translation-transfer-new-draft-transl: A new translation draft exists. '''[$1 Check the draft]'''
bs-translation-transfer-translation-exis: Page "$1" was not translated because suggested translation already exists and is linked with other page. Please rename the page to get another translation.
bs-translation-transfer-config-namespace: Select names of namespaces that should be used for translation
bs-translation-transfer-ui-source-namesp: Select the namespace from the source wiki used for translations
bs-translation-transfer-ui-target-namesp: Specifies how the source namespace is named in the selected language
bs-translation-transfer-ui-target-lang-h: Defines the language used for translating the namespace
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-desc: All existing translations are listed here and can be edited or deleted. New translations can be added separately during the page translation process.
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-edit-: Please be cautious when editing translations. Changes will modify the page title and all links to this page must be updated manually
{{PLURAL:$1|One page needs|$1 pages need}} to be updated manually. View [$2 all affected pages].
Are you sure you want to change the translation from $1 to $2?
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-trans: Suggested translation already exists for other source in the same namespace.
bs-translation-transfer-dictionary-remov: Are you sure you want to remove the translation for $1?
bs-translation-transfer-special-page-not: It looks that you are missing some BlueSpiceTranslationTransfer configuration. Please contact your administrator to properly do that.
bs-translation-transfer-glossary-sync-er: There was an error during glossary synchronization
bs-translation-transfer-config-namespace: Select the namespaces to include in the translation workflow for this wiki
bs-translation-transfer-ui-related-resou: These pages were transferred successfully and require no further adjustment.
These pages could not be transferred automatically. Please check the content and make any necessary adjustments.
Shows the reason why page was not transferred
bs-translation-transfer-related-file-pus: The file could not be pushed because other extensions are interfering with the process. Please check your extensions or contact your administrator.
The file exists in the source wiki but the local path is incorrect.
The file does not exist in the source wiki
bs-translation-transfer-related-title-pu: No revision could be found for the source title.
The revision information could not be retrieved from the target wiki.
The revision information could not be retrieved due to an invalid response.
A page with this title already exists in the target wiki and is not related to the source page.
The page already exists on the target wiki and nothing has changed on the source wiki since it was last transferred
The page already exists on the target wiki and has been modified.
The transfer failed due to an unexpected error. Please contact your administrator.
